com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz

Class FriendsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.Notification
      • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.FriendsList

  • public class FriendsList
extends Notification
    FriendsList manages confirmed, pending and blocked friends for a single user.
